description: drive the browser to the page
example: I am on Admin Panel Page

argDescription.pageClass: the class of the page after transformation

description: clear the field and fill a value to a field WITHOUT PRESSING ENTER. the value better be identifier being translated in SampleTransformer
example: I fill correct account email to email field

argDescription.sample: a string or a key value to be transformed in SampleTransformer
argDescription.elementId: the identifier mapped to the selector in the page object

description: clear the field and fill a value to a field ALSO PRESS ENTER. the value better be identifier being translated in SampleTransformer
example: I input Red to add options field

argDescription.sample: a string or a key value to be transformed in SampleTransformer
argDescription.elementId: the identifier mapped to the selector in the page object

description: clear the field and fill a value to one of the matched fields ALSO PRESS ENTER. the value better be identifier being translated in SampleTransformer
example: I input Red to 2nd add options field

argDescription.sample: a string or a key value to be transformed in SampleTransformer
argDescription.order: the order of the target element (1st | 2nd | 3rd | 10th)
argDescription.elementId: the identifier mapped to the selector in the page object
the identifier mapped to the selector in the page object

example: I select Iceland of based country dropdown menu

argDescription.elementId: the identifier of the drop down menu mapped to the selector in the page object

argDescription.count: the expected count of the element
argDescription.elementId: the identifier mapped to the selector in the page object
